p: The indicator organisms (bacteria) were grown in 3 mL LB broth overnight at 37 °C. For the test, final inoculum concentrations of 106 CFU/mL were used. Fungal spore suspensions were collected from the surface of such fungal colonies by gently scraping with a loop and suspended in 3 mL Potato Dextrose broth (PDB). This suspension was mixed vigorously by vortexing for 15-20 min. The spore suspension stock was diluted to obtain a concentration of 106 spores/mL (measured by Malassez blade).
